exercises.name: Bodyweight Squat
instructions: Stand with feet shoulder-width apart, toes slightly pointed out
Extend arms forward for balance or place hands on hips
Push hips back and bend knees to lower your body
Lower until thighs are parallel to the floor or as low as comfortable
Press through heels to return to standing

exercises.name: Goblet Squat
instructions: Hold a dumbbell vertically at chest height with both hands cupping the top
Stand with feet slightly wider than shoulder-width apart
Push hips back and lower into a squat, keeping the weight close to chest
Lower until elbows touch inside of knees or thighs are parallel
Drive through heels to stand back up

exercises.name: Barbell Back Squat
instructions: Set barbell on squat rack at upper chest height
Step under the bar, positioning it across upper back on rear deltoids
Grip bar wider than shoulder-width and unrack by standing up
Step back and set feet shoulder-width apart
Brace core, push hips back, and lower until thighs are parallel
Drive through heels to return to standing

exercises.name: Barbell Front Squat
instructions: Set barbell on rack at shoulder height
Position bar across front deltoids with elbows high
Use clean grip or crossed-arm grip to secure bar
Unrack and step back with feet shoulder-width apart
Lower into squat keeping torso very upright
Drive up through heels maintaining high elbow position

exercises.name: Bulgarian Split Squat
instructions: Stand about two feet in front of a bench facing away
Place top of rear foot on the bench behind you
Lower your body by bending the front knee
Descend until front thigh is parallel to floor
Push through front heel to return to start
Complete all reps on one side before switching

exercises.name: Dumbbell Bulgarian Split Squat
instructions: Hold a dumbbell in each hand at your sides
Stand about two feet in front of a bench facing away
Place top of rear foot on the bench
Lower by bending front knee until thigh is parallel
Press through front heel to stand
Complete all reps then switch sides

exercises.name: Sumo Squat
instructions: Stand with feet wider than shoulder-width, toes pointed out 45 degrees
Place hands together at chest or on hips
Push hips back and bend knees to lower
Lower until thighs are parallel to floor
Press through heels and squeeze inner thighs to stand

exercises.name: Dumbbell Sumo Squat
instructions: Stand with wide stance, toes pointed out
Hold one dumbbell with both hands hanging between legs
Push hips back and lower into squat
Descend until dumbbell nearly touches floor
Drive through heels to return to standing

exercises.name: Pistol Squat
instructions: Stand on one leg with other leg extended straight in front
Extend arms forward for balance
Slowly lower your body on the standing leg
Descend as low as possible while keeping extended leg off floor
Press through heel to stand back up
Complete all reps then switch legs

exercises.name: Box Squat
instructions: Stand in front of a box with feet shoulder-width apart
Push hips back and lower until seated on the box
Pause briefly on the box without relaxing completely
Drive through heels to stand back up explosively
Fully extend hips at the top

exercises.name: Forward Lunge
instructions: Stand with feet hip-width apart, hands on hips
Step forward with one leg about 2-3 feet
Lower your body until both knees are at 90 degrees
Front thigh should be parallel to floor
Push off front foot to return to starting position
Alternate legs or complete all reps on one side

exercises.name: Dumbbell Forward Lunge
instructions: Stand holding dumbbells at sides with palms facing in
Step forward with one leg about 2-3 feet
Lower until both knees reach 90 degrees
Push through front heel to return to start
Alternate legs each rep

exercises.name: Reverse Lunge
instructions: Stand with feet hip-width apart
Step backward with one leg about 2-3 feet
Lower until both knees are at 90 degrees
Keep front shin vertical
Push through front heel to return to standing
Alternate legs or complete set on one side
cues: More glute emphasis than forward lunge

exercises.name: Dumbbell Reverse Lunge
instructions: Hold dumbbells at sides with neutral grip
Step backward with one leg
Lower until both knees are bent 90 degrees
Drive through front heel to return to start
Alternate sides each rep

exercises.name: Walking Lunge
instructions: Stand with feet together, hands on hips or at sides
Step forward into a lunge position
Lower until both knees are at 90 degrees
Push off back foot and bring it forward to step into next lunge
Continue walking forward alternating legs

exercises.name: Lateral Lunge
instructions: Stand with feet together, hands at chest or on hips
Take a large step directly to the side
Push hips back and bend stepping leg while keeping other leg straight
Lower until stepping thigh is parallel to floor
Push through heel to return to start
Alternate sides or complete all reps on one side

exercises.name: Curtsy Lunge
instructions: Stand with feet hip-width apart, hands on hips
Step one leg diagonally behind and across your body
Lower until front thigh is parallel to floor
Keep torso upright and hips facing forward
Push through front heel to return to start
Alternate sides or complete set on one side

exercises.name: Dumbbell Romanian Deadlift
instructions: Stand with feet hip-width apart holding dumbbells in front of thighs
Keep slight bend in knees throughout the movement
Push hips back and lower weights along front of legs
Lower until you feel stretch in hamstrings or weights reach shin level
Drive hips forward to return to standing
Squeeze glutes at the top

exercises.name: Barbell Romanian Deadlift
instructions: Stand holding barbell with overhand grip at hip level
Feet hip-width apart, slight bend in knees
Push hips back while lowering bar along legs
Keep bar close to body throughout
Lower until hamstrings are fully stretched
Drive hips forward to return to standing

exercises.name: Single-Leg Romanian Deadlift
instructions: Stand on one leg with slight bend in the knee
Extend arms down or out for balance
Hinge at hip lowering torso while lifting back leg
Keep back leg and torso in a straight line
Lower until torso is nearly parallel to floor
Return to standing by driving hip forward

exercises.name: Dumbbell Single-Leg Romanian Deadlift
instructions: Stand on one leg holding dumbbell in opposite hand
Keep standing leg slightly bent
Hinge forward lowering weight while back leg extends
Lower until torso is parallel to floor
Drive hip forward to return to standing
Complete all reps then switch sides
cues: Weight in opposite hand aids balance

exercises.name: Sumo Deadlift
instructions: Stand with very wide stance, toes pointed out
Grip barbell inside your legs with arms straight
Push hips back and lower to grip the bar
Brace core and drive through heels to stand
Keep bar close to body throughout lift
Lower with control by pushing hips back

exercises.name: Barbell Hip Thrust
instructions: Sit on floor with upper back against bench
Roll barbell over hips and position pad for comfort
Feet flat on floor about hip-width apart
Drive through heels and thrust hips toward ceiling
Squeeze glutes hard at top of movement
Lower hips with control and repeat
cues: Feet positioned so shins are vertical at top

exercises.name: Dumbbell Hip Thrust
instructions: Sit on floor with upper back against bench
Place dumbbell on hip crease and hold with both hands
Position feet flat on floor hip-width apart
Thrust hips up by driving through heels
Squeeze glutes at the top
Lower with control

exercises.name: Glute Bridge
instructions: Lie on back with knees bent and feet flat on floor
Arms at sides with palms down
Push through heels to lift hips off floor
Raise until body forms straight line from shoulders to knees
Squeeze glutes hard at the top
Lower hips back down with control

exercises.name: Single-Leg Glute Bridge
instructions: Lie on back with knees bent and feet flat
Extend one leg straight up toward ceiling
Push through heel of grounded foot to lift hips
Raise until body forms straight line
Keep extended leg pointing up throughout
Complete all reps then switch legs

exercises.name: Banded Glute Bridge
instructions: Place mini band around thighs just above knees
Lie on back with knees bent, feet hip-width apart
Push knees out against band tension
Drive through heels to lift hips
Maintain outward knee pressure throughout
Lower with control keeping tension on band

exercises.name: Good Morning
instructions: Position barbell across upper back as in back squat
Stand with feet shoulder-width apart
Keep slight bend in knees throughout
Hinge at hips pushing them back
Lower torso until nearly parallel to floor
Drive hips forward to return to standing

exercises.name: Leg Press
instructions: Sit in leg press machine with back flat against pad
Place feet shoulder-width apart on platform
Release safety handles and extend legs
Lower platform by bending knees toward chest
Lower until knees are at 90 degrees
Press through feet to extend legs without locking knees

exercises.name: Narrow Stance Leg Press
instructions: Sit in leg press with back flat against pad
Place feet close together in center of platform
Release safeties and extend legs
Lower platform with control
Press back up without locking knees

exercises.name: Hack Squat
instructions: Position yourself in hack squat machine with shoulders under pads
Place feet shoulder-width apart on platform
Release safety handles and stand to full extension
Lower by bending knees until thighs are parallel
Press through feet to return to standing
Don't lock knees at the top

exercises.name: Leg Extension
instructions: Sit in leg extension machine with back against pad
Position pad on lower shins just above ankles
Grip handles at sides for stability
Extend legs until straight but not locked
Squeeze quads at the top
Lower with control to starting position

exercises.name: Lying Leg Curl
instructions: Lie face down on leg curl machine
Position pad just above heels
Grip handles and keep hips flat on pad
Curl legs up by bending knees
Bring heels as close to glutes as possible
Lower with control

exercises.name: Seated Leg Curl
instructions: Sit in seated leg curl machine
Position pad on back of lower legs above heels
Secure thigh pad above knees
Curl legs down and back bending at knees
Squeeze hamstrings at bottom position
Return to start with control

exercises.name: Standing Leg Curl
instructions: Stand facing standing leg curl machine
Position pad on back of one ankle
Hold handles for support
Curl heel toward glute by bending knee
Squeeze hamstring at top
Lower with control and repeat

exercises.name: Standing Calf Raise
instructions: Position shoulders under pads of calf raise machine
Stand with balls of feet on platform, heels hanging off
Lower heels below platform for full stretch
Push through balls of feet to raise heels high
Squeeze calves at the top
Lower with control

exercises.name: Seated Calf Raise
instructions: Sit at seated calf raise machine
Place balls of feet on platform with knees under pad
Release safety and lower heels for stretch
Push through toes to raise heels as high as possible
Squeeze calves at the top
Lower with control

exercises.name: Single-Leg Calf Raise
instructions: Stand on edge of step on one foot
Hold wall or railing for balance
Lower heel below step level for full stretch
Push through ball of foot to rise as high as possible
Squeeze calf at the top
Complete all reps then switch legs

exercises.name: Dumbbell Calf Raise
instructions: Stand with balls of feet on weight plate, heels on floor
Hold dumbbells at sides
Rise up on toes as high as possible
Squeeze calves at the top
Lower heels back to floor with control
Repeat for desired reps

exercises.name: Step-Up
instructions: Stand facing a box or bench at knee height
Place one foot entirely on the box
Press through heel to step up onto the box
Bring other foot up to stand on box
Step back down with control
Alternate lead leg or complete all reps on one side

exercises.name: Dumbbell Step-Up
instructions: Hold dumbbells at sides facing a box
Place one foot on the box
Drive through heel to step up
Stand fully on box then step down
Alternate legs or complete set on one side

exercises.name: Box Jump
instructions: Stand facing box with feet shoulder-width apart
Swing arms back while bending at hips and knees
Explosively jump up driving arms forward
Land softly on box with both feet
Stand fully then step down carefully
Reset and repeat

exercises.name: Jump Squat
instructions: Stand with feet shoulder-width apart
Lower into a squat position
Explosively jump up as high as possible
Swing arms up to generate momentum
Land softly with bent knees
Immediately lower into next rep

exercises.name: Wall Sit
instructions: Stand with back against wall
Walk feet out and slide down wall
Lower until thighs are parallel to floor
Knees should be at 90 degree angle
Keep back flat against wall
Hold position for time

exercises.name: Forward Leg Swing
instructions: Stand sideways to wall holding it for support
Shift weight to inside leg
Swing outside leg forward and back in controlled arc
Keep torso upright throughout
Gradually increase range of motion
Complete reps then switch sides

exercises.name: Lateral Leg Swing
instructions: Face wall with both hands on it for support
Shift weight to one leg
Swing other leg side to side across body
Keep torso facing forward
Gradually increase range of motion
Switch legs after completing reps

exercises.name: Hip Abduction Machine
instructions: Sit in hip abduction machine with legs inside pads
Grip handles and keep back against pad
Press legs outward against resistance
Push as wide as comfortable
Slowly return to starting position
Control the return motion

exercises.name: Hip Adduction Machine
instructions: Sit in hip adduction machine with legs outside pads
Start with legs spread wide
Grip handles and keep back against pad
Squeeze legs together against resistance
Bring legs as close together as possible
Slowly return to starting position

exercises.name: Glute Kickback Machine
instructions: Position yourself on glute kickback machine
Place one foot on platform or pad
Grip handles for stability
Push leg back in arc motion
Squeeze glute at full extension
Return with control and repeat

exercises.name: Smith Machine Squat
instructions: Position bar across upper back under Smith machine
Stand with feet slightly forward of bar path
Unrack by rotating bar hooks
Lower into squat keeping bar path vertical
Descend until thighs are parallel
Drive up through heels to return

exercises.name: Barbell Lunge
instructions: Position barbell across upper back as in squat
Unrack and step back from rack
Step forward into lunge position
Lower until both knees are at 90 degrees
Push through front heel to return
Alternate legs each rep

exercises.name: Banded Squat
instructions: Place mini band around thighs just above knees
Stand with feet shoulder-width apart
Push knees out against band tension
Lower into squat while maintaining outward knee pressure
Descend until thighs are parallel
Drive up while keeping tension on band

exercises.name: Banded Lateral Walk
instructions: Place mini band around thighs above knees or around ankles
Stand in quarter squat position
Step laterally leading with one foot
Follow with other foot maintaining tension
Take small controlled steps
Complete steps in one direction then reverse
cues: Feel the burn in outer glutes
